text: The 2017–18 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season began in September 2017 and ended with the 2018 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey tournament's championship game. ==Pre-season polls== The top 10 from USCHO.com and the top 10 from USA Today/USA Hockey Magazine, First place votes are in parentheses. ==Regular season== ===Standings=== ==Player stats== ===Scoring leaders=== ===Leading goaltenders=== ==Awards== ===WCHA=== ===CHA=== ===Women's Hockey East Association (WHEA)=== ===ECAC=== ===Patty Kazmaier Award=== ===AHCA Coach of the Year=== ==References== NCAA Category:NCAA Division I women's ice hockey seasons
title: 2017–18 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season
